headline.main: Error Traps Cruewell; RETREAT IN DESERT IS STAGED BY NAZIS

lead_paragraph: WITH BRITISH FORCES in Libya, May 31 (Delayed) (AP) -- General Ludwig Cruewell, a commander of the German Africa Corps, who was captured May 26, said tonight that he had been taken prisoner because his pilot had landed in the midst of British desert troops in the mistaken belief that they were Italians.
abstract: Rommel tank forces retreat as German tank comdr, Gen Cruewell is captured, Libya; Brit continues pursuit; Brit submarines score against Axis Mediterranean supply lines; Germans admit Cruewell capture; Itals rept Brit forces repulsed in counter-attacks; rept Brit raid on Messina, Sicily

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
